no_corresponding_language: No corresponding language in the dictionary file: {lang}
restart_plugin_desc: Restart the plugin to apply the new language
overload_plugin_desc: Reload the plugin to apply the new language
record_untranslated_strings_desc: Whether to record untranslated strings to the list
untranslated_text_will_export_to: Untranslated text will be exported to
add_translation_mark_desc: Whether to add a mark at the beginning of the translated text
translation_mark_desc: Customize the mark for the translated text
default_dictionary_path: Specify a custom dictionary file path, the default path is dictionary.json in the plugin directory
update_builtin_dictionary_desc: Whether to update the built-in dictionary
open_plugin_directory_desc: Open the plugin directory in the file manager
enable_debug_desc: Enable debug mode to see more information in the console
